name: Dice Arena (FreschGames)
description:
Welcome to the arena!

Collect your bravest dice and conquer the (endless) arena!
Choose your favorite set from 10 different skills and create your very own strategy.

Face more and more opponents and become the champion of the arena! (Or something like that!)

Warning:
At first the difficulty can be a bit high (it's only RNG). But you can do it!

Known bugs:
There is no tutorial... controls below!
and a few more?

Controls:
Move cursor: WASD / arrow key
Confirm action: Spacebar / Enter

In the shop:
To buy new skills,

Choose the dice > choose an empty or occupied skill slot from the dice > choose the shop skill > buy

New dice cost 100, and all dice can be revived (post-combat) for half their ability cost.
